alert.note: Alert for Oswego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 08 at 5:07AM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...HEAVY LAKE EFFECT RAIN WILL IMPACT CENTRAL OSWEGO COUNTY THROUGH 630 AM EDT... At 504 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a band of heavy lake effect rain across central Oswego County. This band of lake effect rain will remain nearly stationary through daybreak. HAZARD...Heavy lake effect rain and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Heavy rain will result in ponding of water in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Oswego, Central Square, Redfield, Nine Mile Point, Hastings, Scriba, Volney, West Monroe, Palermo, New Haven, Minetto, Mexico, Parish, and Altmar. This includes Interstate 81 between exits 32 and 35. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is occurring with this band of lake effect rain and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
